summary.para: Defines constants that specify which formats are supported in a font, either at a font-wide level or per glyph.

For color fonts, these formats can be used to represent color glyphs. Fonts can contain multiple drawable data formats for glyphs. And an app can use these values to tell DirectWrite which formats to return when splitting a color glyph run.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_NONE
member.summary: Specifies that no data is available for this glyph.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_TRUETYPE
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has TrueType outlines.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_CFF
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has CFF outlines.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_COLR
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has multilayered COLR data.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_SVG
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has SVG outlines as standard XML. Fonts may store the content gzip'd rather than plain text, indicated by the first two bytes as gzip header {0x1F 0x8B}.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_PNG
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has PNG image data, with standard PNG IHDR.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_JPEG
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has JPEG image data, with standard JIFF SOI header.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_TIFF
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has TIFF image data.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_PREMULTIPLIED_B8G8R8A8
member.summary: Specifies that the glyph has raw 32-bit premultiplied BGRA data.

summary.blockquote: [!IMPORTANT] The DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_COLR_PAINT_TREE constant is available in pre-release versions of the Windows Insider Preview.
summary.para: Specifies that the glyph is represented by a tree of paint elements in the font's COLR table.
